rules: Each user will be given 1 resource at the beginning of their turn. Which will increment by 1 each turn.
The maximum number of resources a user can have is 10.
Each player will have a field in which they will be able to place a maximum of 5 cards on a field. A user will start with a deck of 30 cards, and 5 cards in their hand.
The object of the game is to defeat the other user by bringing their health of 250 down to zero. The maximum health a card can have is 100 and for damage would be 100.
